level.heading: PSH PROGRAM – ASSESSMENT AND CASE MANAGEMENT (§ 29-2538)

level.text: The PSH Program shall offer participants a comprehensive needs assessment and case management.

Participants shall not be required to participate in the needs assessment or case management as a condition of receipt of the housing assistance or other PSH services, except that the PSH Program may require reasonable minimal case management requirements as set forth in the PSH Program Rules, in order to ensure the PSH Program provides reasonable oversight of its program and participants.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 6438 (July 23, 2010)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice Emergency Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 11353 (November 26, 2010)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Emergency Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 3007 (April 8, 2011)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 7442, 7484 (August 19, 2011).
